About Me

Driven, productive, and effective engineering manager with 20 years of experience, ranging from start-ups to enterprise-level organizations. I have been managing and developing applications and services in the telecom and daily-deals industries, serving across all business functions including, but not limited to sales, sales operations, customer service, finance, marketing, and human resources.
